name: MLORD
description: What is the project about? MemeLord Token is The Artistic Meme Revolution. It is a vibrant and playful tribute to the iconic artist and meme creator, Matt Furie. Drawing inspiration from Furie's imaginative and humorous creations, MEMELORD is here to bring a fusion of art and humor to the blockchain, redefining how we engage with memes and digital art. What makes your project unique? We are creating ecosystem for NFT creator and artist which will help global NFT creators and lovers to get easy access and native platform to sell their NFT assets. History of your project. We have started our project from the necessity of NFT users and artist who want to establish their genuine portfolio according to their created NFT assets. Whatâ€™s next for your project? Mlord team is dedicated to follow the roadmap and deliver all necessary components of the ecosytem to make it fully accesible for users. What can your token be used for? Our ecosystem users can use our token for their payment during submitting their NFT and purchase. When they select Mlord token as their payment option it will give them extra discounts then regular payment options.
